alert.note: Alert for Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Adams and central Washington Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over McChord Butte, or 20 miles north of Weiser, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mann Creek Guard Station around 400 PM MDT. Sturgill Peak around 410 PM MDT. Cambridge around 430 PM MDT. Goodrich, Pyramid Point and Mesa around 440 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
